|rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM SerComm, probable model IP806SM "4900MZ30" is silkscreened on the board. There is no FCC ID printed on the label. The FCC ID of the probable OEM model has been assigned to it. While booting, the device may temporarily take on the SSID of '''Marvell-AP32'''. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/hotbrick-soho-401w-80211g-wireless-firewall-441 On SpeedGuide.net]
